00082 /* /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00083  * Compatibility
00084  */
00085 
00086 /* FASTFORMAT_NO_FILTER_TYPE_CONVERSION_SHIM_SUPPORT
00087  *
00088  * Some compilers can't handle the filter_type mechanism, so we must allow
00089  * for it to be disabled
00090  */
00091 
00092 #if (   defined(STLSOFT_COMPILER_IS_BORLAND) && \
00093         __BORLANDC__ < 0x0600) /* This is a guess, since I cannot verify whether 5.9.x supports filter_type; 5.8 does not, 6.1 does */ || \
00094     defined(STLSOFT_COMPILER_IS_DMC) || \
00095     defined(STLSOFT_COMPILER_IS_WATCOM)
00096 # define FASTFORMAT_NO_FILTER_TYPE_CONVERSION_SHIM_SUPPORT
00097 #endif /* compiler */
00098 
00099 /* FASTFORMAT_SUPPORT_IMPLICIT_SHIM_STRING_ACTION_SHIM
00100  *
00101  * Determines whether support for using a shim string as a sink is
00102  * available
00103  */
00104 
00105 #ifndef FASTFORMAT_NO_FILTER_TYPE_CONVERSION_SHIM_SUPPORT
00106 # if defined(STLSOFT_COMPILER_IS_MWERKS) || \
00107      (  defined(STLSOFT_COMPILER_IS_GCC) && \
00108         (   __GNUC__ >= 4 || \
00109             (   __GNUC__ == 3 && \
00110                 __GNUC_MINOR__ >= 4))) || \
00111     (   defined(STLSOFT_COMPILER_IS_MSVC) && \
00112         _MSC_VER >= 1310)
00113   /* allow shim string action shim for these compilers ...
00114    *
00115    * ... unless STLSoft main line is not 1.10 and 1.10 alpha is not
00116    * present
00117    */
00118 #  include <stlsoft/string/shim_string.hpp>
00119 #  if _STLSOFT_VER >= 0x010a0000 || \
00120       (   defined(_STLSOFT_1_10_VER) && \
00121           _STLSOFT_1_10_VER >= 0x010a0105)
00122 #   define FASTFORMAT_SUPPORT_IMPLICIT_SHIM_STRING_ACTION_SHIM
00123 #  else /* ? shim string version */
00124 #   ifndef FASTFORMAT_NO_VERSION_NAG
00125 #    ifdef STLSOFT_PPF_pragma_message_SUPPORT
00126 #     pragma message(__FILE__ "(" STLSOFT_STRINGIZE(__LINE__) "): " "NOTE: Implicit support for shim_string sinks is not enabled. To enable this, download STLSoft 1.10 alpha 5+ and add -I$STLSOFT_1_10/include to your command-line/project include directories _before_ -$STLSOFT/include; to suppress this message, #define FASTFORMAT_NO_VERSION_NAG")
00127 #    endif /* STLSOFT_PPF_pragma_message_SUPPORT */
00128 #   endif /* !FASTFORMAT_NO_VERSION_NAG */
00129 #  endif /* shim string version */
00130 # endif /* compiler */
00131 #endif /* !FASTFORMAT_NO_FILTER_TYPE_CONVERSION_SHIM_SUPPORT */

00186  /* Default sinks:
00187   *
00188   * - "generic string", aka anything that is structurally conformant with std::basic_string<ff_char_t>
00189   * - STLSoft's shim string
00190   */
00191

00193 #  include <fastformat/shims/action/fmt_slices/generic_string.hpp>
00194 # endif /* !FASTFORMAT_NO_IMPLICIT_GENERIC_STRING_ACTION_SHIM */
00195 
00196 # if !defined(FASTFORMAT_NO_IMPLICIT_SHIM_STRING_ACTION_SHIM)
00197 #  if defined(FASTFORMAT_SUPPORT_IMPLICIT_SHIM_STRING_ACTION_SHIM)
00198 #   include <fastformat/sinks/shim_string.hpp>
00199 #  endif /* FASTFORMAT_SUPPORT_IMPLICIT_SHIM_STRING_ACTION_SHIM */
00200 # endif /* !FASTFORMAT_NO_IMPLICIT_SHIM_STRING_ACTION_SHIM */
00201 
00202 # ifndef FASTFORMAT_LEAN_AND_MEAN
00203

00214 
00215 # endif /* !FASTFORMAT_LEAN_AND_MEAN */

00224 /* /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00225  * Conversion shims for implicit filtering
00226  */
00227 
00228 #if !defined(FASTFORMAT_NO_NAMESPACE)
00229 namespace filters
00230 {
00231 #endif /* !FASTFORMAT_NO_NAMESPACE */
00232 
00234 template<   typename T /* The type to be converted */
00235         ,   typename C /* The character type */
00236         >
00237 inline T const& filter_type(T const& t, T const*, C const volatile*)
00238 {
00239     return t;
00240 }
00241 
00242 #if !defined(FASTFORMAT_NO_NAMESPACE)
00243 } /* namespace filters */
00244 #endif /* !FASTFORMAT_NO_NAMESPACE */
00245

00256   /* By default uses the fast non-l7d conversions. Can request l7d ones
00257    * by FASTFORMAT_USE_L7D_INTEGER_CONVERSION_SHIMS.

00259 # if defined(FASTFORMAT_USE_L7D_INTEGER_CONVERSION_SHIMS)
00260 #  error Feature not yet implemented. Please register your interest via sourceforge.net/forum/forum.php?forum_id=612781 and your wish might be granted
00261 /* #  include <fastformat/shims/conversion/filter_type/l7d_integers.hpp> */
00262 # elif !defined(FASTFORMAT_NO_DEFAULT_INTEGER_CONVERSION_SHIMS)
00263 #  include <fastformat/shims/conversion/filter_type/fast_integers.hpp>
00264 # endif /* !FASTFORMAT_NO_DEFAULT_INTEGER_CONVERSION_SHIMS */
00265 
00266 # if defined(FASTFORMAT_USE_L7D_REAL_CONVERSION_SHIMS)
00267 #  error Feature not yet implemented. Please register your interest via sourceforge.net/forum/forum.php?forum_id=612781 and your wish might be granted

00410 template <typename S>
00411 inline S& flush(
00412     S& sink
00413 )
00414 {
00415     FASTFORMAT_DECLARE_fmt_slices_();
00416 
00417     return FASTFORMAT_INVOKE_fmt_slices_(sink, flags::ff_flush, 0, 0, NULL);
00418 }
00419 
00420 /* /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00421  * Auto-initialisation
00422  *
00423  * Except when making a DLL, this is automatic, unless FASTFORMAT_NO_AUTO_INIT
00424  * is defined.
00425  *
00426  * To force it for a DLL, define FASTFORMAT_FORCE_AUTO_INIT
00427  */
00428 
00429 #if defined(__DLL__) /* Borland, with -WD */ || \
00430     defined(_WINDLL) /* VC++, defined by user/wizard */ || \
00431     defined(_USRDLL) /* VC++, defined by user/wizard */
00432 # define FASTFORMAT_NO_AUTO_INIT
00433 #endif /* dynamic library */
00434 
00435 #ifdef FASTFORMAT_DOCUMENTATION_SKIP_SECTION
00436 # include "./internal/initialiser.hpp"
00437 #else /* ? FASTFORMAT_DOCUMENTATION_SKIP_SECTION */
00438 # if defined(FASTFORMAT_FORCE_AUTO_INIT) || \
00439      !defined(FASTFORMAT_NO_AUTO_INIT)
00440 #  include <fastformat/internal/initialiser.hpp> /* Schwarz counter initialisation */
00441 # endif /* FASTFORMAT_FORCE_AUTO_INIT || !FASTFORMAT_NO_AUTO_INIT */
00442 #endif /* FASTFORMAT_DOCUMENTATION_SKIP_SECTION */
